A building with an external staircase occupies the left side, stretching from the foreground to the middle ground, where a small enemy figure stands at the top of the stairs in the center. A dark green military vehicle is situated in the center-right middle ground, adjacent to stacked crates. Game interface elements, such as a minimap in the bottom left and health/ammo displays in the bottom right, are fixed in the foreground, while objective markers are distributed across the middle ground. The rifle remains in the bottom center foreground, now angled slightly upward, as the positions of the objective markers in the middle ground update. Throughout the sequence, the camera maintains an eye-level perspective of the unseen player.
